name: BomBardMent (Wrecktal Prolapse, Jarn)
description:
Defend yourself against a barrage of laser balls. The game gets increasingly
difficult so try to get as many points as possible. 
You get points by killing turrets with charged balls

Controls

Right hand: Charge your shield with the grip on the controller. Catch laserballs to get
ammo. Shoot charged balls with the right trigger

Reflect laserballs with your shield to send out a supercharged laserball, dealing more
damage than usual

Shoot a charged laserball or reflect a supercharged ball to get powerups
